summary:
Warhammer 40,000 is a popular tabletop game where players battle with miniature figures on a model battlefield. It's set in a futuristic world with humans, aliens, and supernatural creatures. Players take turns moving their models and fighting, using dice to decide the outcome.

The game, created by Games Workshop, has been around since 1987 and has a huge following. It's known for its dark and exciting story, which has been turned into novels and video games. There are also other tabletop games based on Warhammer 40,000, each with unique rules and themes.
title: Warhammer 40,000
